welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mejicanos, El Salvador! Get ready to experience the vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our charming city and make unforgettable memories during your visit.

restaurants.name: Pollo Campero Metrópolis
restaurants.description: Pollo Campero Metrópolis is a fried chicken joint located in Mejicanos.
restaurants.address: Centro Comercial Unicentro Metrópolis, Mejicanos, San Salvador

restaurants.name: Domino's Pizza
restaurants.description: Domino's Pizza is a pizzeria located in the city.
restaurants.address: Bulevard Constitucion (Contiguo a entrada Reparto Los Rosales)

restaurants.name: Restaurante Diamante de China
restaurants.description: Restaurante Diamante de China is a chinese restaurant located in San Salvador.
restaurants.address: Blvd. Constitución #13 Col. Miralvalle (Después de La Chulona), San Salvador, San Salvador

restaurants.name: La Susheria
restaurants.description: La Susheria is a sushi restaurant located in San Salvador.
restaurants.address: Blvd Constitución #9, San Salvador, San Salvador

restaurants.name: La Pampa Argentina
restaurants.description: La Pampa Argentina is a argentinian restaurant located in San Salvador.
restaurants.address: Boulevard Constitución, San Salvador, San Salvador

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
